languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} охотника за головами. Они всегда достигают цели, а {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} всегда является {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Охотник за головами получает −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
The Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of prey in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Hunter's line of sight. The attacks always hit and always score critical hits.
Until the end of combat, the Hunter's Ballistic Skill, Perception, and Agility are reduced by -20.

The Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of prey in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Hunter's line of sight. The attacks always hit and always score critical hits.
Until the end of combat, the Hunter's Ballistic Skill, Perception, and Agility are reduced by −20.

The Bounty Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Perception, and Agility are reduced by −20.

The Bounty Hunter simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Perception, and Agility are reduced by −20.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} в бою. traits.locale_text:
Охотник совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом "добыча" в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне видимости охотника. Они всегда достигают цели, а попадание всегда является критическим.
Охотник получает −20 к Дальнему Бою, Восприятию и Ловкости до конца боя.

Охотник совершает одновременно несколько атак в количестве, равном числу врагов с эффектом "добыча" в бою. Эти атаки равномерно распределяются между всей добычей в зоне видимости охотника. Они всегда достигают цели, а попадание всегда является критическим.
Охотник получает −20 к Дальнему Бою, Восприятию и Ловкости до конца боя.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}同时发动多次攻击，攻击次数等同于战场上{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的数量。赏金猎人的攻击会平均分配给赏金猎人{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有猎物。所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，而且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害。
然而，赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}会降低20点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text:
猎人同时发动多次攻击，攻击次数等同于战场上猎物的数量。猎人的攻击会平均分配给猎人{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有猎物。所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，而且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害。
然而，猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}会降低-20，效果持续至战斗结束。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}同时发动多次攻击，攻击次数等同于战场上{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的数量。赏金猎人的攻击会平均分配给赏金猎人{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有猎物。所有攻击都必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，而且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害。
然而，赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}会降低20点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúa varios ataques simultáneos. La cantidad de ataques es igual al número de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g} que haya en el combate. Estos ataques se reparten equitativamente entre todas las presas que estén dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del cazarrecompensas. Los ataques siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} y siempre son {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, las puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del cazarrecompensas se reducen en −20.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúa varios ataques simultáneos. La cantidad de ataques es igual al número de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g} que haya en el combate. Los ataques siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} y siempre son {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, las puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del cazarrecompensas se reducen en −20.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt gleichzeitig mehrere Angriffe aus. Die Anzahl der Angriffe ist gleich der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} im Kampf. Diese Angriffe werden gleichmäßig auf sämtliche Beute in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers aufgeteilt. Die Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} immer und führen immer zu {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffern{/g}.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes sind {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers um −20 reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt gleichzeitig mehrere Angriffe aus. Die Anzahl der Angriffe ist gleich der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} im Kampf. Diese Angriffe werden gleichmäßig auf sämtliche Beute in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers aufgeteilt. Die Angriffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} immer und führen immer zu {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffern{/g}.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes sind {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers um −20 reduziert.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} lance plusieurs attaques simultanées. Le nombre d'attaques est égal au nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proies{/g} disponibles au combat. Ces attaques sont réparties équitablement entre toutes les proies dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du chasseur de primes. Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchent{/g} toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
Une réduction de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} du chasseur de primes jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.

traits.locale_text:
Le chasseur de primes lance plusieurs attaques simultanées. Le nombre d'attaques est égal au nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proies{/g} disponibles au combat. Ces attaques sont réparties équitablement entre toutes les proies dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du chasseur de primes. Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchent{/g} toujours leur cible et portent systématiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
Une réduction de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, à la Perception et à l'Agilité du chasseur de primes jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が連続で複数回の攻撃を行う。攻撃回数は戦闘中の{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}の数に等しい。これらの攻撃は、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての獲物に等しく分割される。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
戦闘終了まで、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が−20減少する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が連続で複数回の攻撃を行う。攻撃回数は戦闘中の{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}の数に等しい。これらの攻撃は、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての獲物に等しく分割される。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
戦闘終了まで、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が−20減少する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g} aynı anda birden fazla saldırı gerçekleştirir. Saldırı sayısı, çatışmadaki {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}av{/g} sayısına eşittir. Bu saldırılar, Ödül Avcısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} tüm avlar arasında eşit olarak bölünür. Saldırılar her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g} ve her seferinde {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
Ödül Avcısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} nitelikleri 20'şer puan düşer. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.
